groups.name: external.api
groups.description: Configuration properties for external API integration.

groups.name: scheduler
groups.description: Configuration properties for the hemograma generation scheduler.

properties.name: external.api.url
properties.description: URL endpoint of the external API where FHIR hemograma bundles will be sent.

properties.name: external.api.timeout
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for HTTP requests to the external API.

properties.name: scheduler.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the automatic hemograma generation scheduler.

properties.name: scheduler.initial-delay
properties.description: Initial delay in milliseconds before the first scheduler execution.

properties.name: scheduler.min-interval-minutes
properties.description: Minimum interval in minutes between scheduler executions.

properties.name: scheduler.max-interval-minutes
properties.description: Maximum interval in minutes between scheduler executions.

properties.name: scheduler.min-batch-size
properties.description: Minimum number of hemogramas to generate in each batch.

properties.name: scheduler.max-batch-size
properties.description: Maximum number of hemogramas to generate in each batch.

values.description: Disable automatic generation (for testing or maintenance).
